channel.title: Advertising the Advertisement Board in the Server Downloads Board
channel.description:
If you look at the Server Downloads board, you'd see there are a bunch of members and guests browsing it - the same sort of audience that once browsed the advertisement board back in the day (well, forums actually). I don't think enough people actually know it's back, so why not post about it in the board or have some sort of notification? I also think we should encourage server hosters to direct their players to the board and give their servers good criticism. It would bring a large amount of traffic to the forums, and the board would likely gain as much popularity as the SSP one day. Just a thought.
~Lin
